title: How to write an application for going to school by my own vehicle - Quora

response.answer_text: In the USA, there is nothing preventing a legally licensed teenager from driving her/himself to school with their own vehicle, as long as they have a Legal place to park that vehicle during the school day. If there are no legal parking spaces close to the school, and the school will not authorize you to park in the school parking lot, then check with homeowners and business owners nearby and see if you can rent a parking spot from one of them. Easy.
